--- In gladiator@y..., "Deathifier" <storey@t...> wrote:
> Hi people,
> I was wondering if you'd provide us programmers with a small, simple
> scenario without too many objects in it to help us conduct initial 
testing.
> 
> It's much easier when you can look at the Hex information in the 
file and
> whats actually being loaded, easier to spot mistakes and track bugs 
and
> stuff :)

Sure.  Download my 'Torture' scenarios, and extract info from numbers 
333 (one opponent: an archmage); 402 (one opponent: slime with lots of 
magic potions); or 666 (two opponents: mage and archmage).  That's the 
scenarios I have made that have the fewest objects in them.  Those 
will also give you a good test of high level numbers go in the grid 
file.
